landing.Iam: I strive to crack the complexity of making things simple and meaningfull. To do so, I love navigating the grey area between imagination and rationalisation.

findme.contactme: You may contact me by email
findme.located: I’m currently located in Paris and can work partially remotely with clients all around western europe.
findme.stayTuned: Stay tuned for more on this website !

aboutme.title: About me
aboutme.paragraph1: I'm {age} year old designer and I'm a curious person always eager to learn from other’s perspectives and experiences.
aboutme.paragraph2: My focus as a professional lies mostly in strategic design and interaction design.

strategicDesign.description: I accompany the problem framing for complex systems requiring the understanding of numerous point of views and expertises.

interactionDesign.description: I define and prototype new digital products with a user centric approach : Business applications, Website, Digital Services …
